headerDisplay: Slide Local (only local API, with optional Digest auth)

name.title: Name
name.description: Name of the platform in Homebridge.

pollInterval.title: Default poll interval (ms)
pollInterval.description: How often to poll each Slide for state updates (0 disables polling).

slides.title: Slides
slides.description: List of Slide devices using the local API.

host.title: Host/IP
host.description: Hostname or IP of the Slide (e.g. 192.168.1.42 or slide-livingroom.local).

code.title: Slide code (Digest password)
code.description: 8-character Slide code for HTTP Digest auth. If empty, requests are sent without auth.

username.title: Digest username
username.description: Usually 'user'. Only used if 'code' is set.

pollInterval.title: Poll interval (ms)
pollInterval.description: Optional per-device override for polling. 0 = no polling.

timeout.title: Request timeout (ms)
timeout.description: Timeout for HTTP requests to this Slide.

tolerance.title: Tolerance (%)
tolerance.description: Allowed deviation before HomeKit considers the target position reached.
